details: Develop backend services using Java and Groovy for integration solutions.
Delivered end-to-end integration implementations leveraging SAP CPI and SuccessFactors.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to architect scalable and robust solutions.
Developed full-stack applications using React and Spring Boot.
Created reusable React components to enhance UI consistency and maintainability.
Led proof-of-concept implementation of OpenTelemetry for frontend performance monitoring.
Delivered multiple client projects utilizing Angular, Node.js, Azure, and Firebase.
Rebuilt the frontend from scratch, implementing optimized Firebase queries with indexing.
Implemented Azure Functions to improve scalability and reduce operational costs.
